dmca.title: Defamation on FanDomination.Net website
dmca.body:
THOMPSON & KNIGHT
LLP
ATTORNEYS AND COUNSELORS
DALLAS, TEXAS 75201-4693

March 17,2003
[private]
FANDOMINATION.NET
[private]
Lakeland, Florida 33809

Re: Defamation Relating to Andy Pettitte

Dear Sir or Madam:

     This firm represents Andy Pettitte in litigation matters. It has recently come to our attention that your Internet website at http://www.fandomination.net has published at least one false and defamatory article about Mr. Pettitte and his family. Specifically, under the
